QuestData.Title: They're So Thorny!
QuestData.Description: The crate, once full of desperately needed supplies, has been thoroughly pillaged.$b$bA quick scan of the area shows evidence left behind by the thieves. Icy thorns, just like the ones on the water sprites on the shoreline to the east.$b$bThis is a life or death situation for your band of survivors. Those supplies need to be retrieved from these thieving pests and returned to camp.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 5 Emergency Supplies from the Water Sprites.
